As the Experience Design team of Ola, we strive to craft memorable experiences for our users across all touchpoints, digital or physical. We believe that experiences are multi-sensorial and evolve over time as users interact with Ola across all our services. We work across multiple platforms and businesses: Riders, Drivers, Food, Money, Electric and Fleet. We are able to achieve this by integrating multiple functions of design: user experience research, product design, brand design, marketing design, and content strategy into one Experience Design team.
